meanings.definition: Full of vigor and energy; robust
meanings.sent1: The puppy was the lustiest in the litter, always running and playing energetically.
meanings.sent2: She was the lustiest dancer at the party, moving with strength and vitality.
meanings.sent3: The lustiest squirrel in the park was constantly darting around, gathering nuts with gusto.
meanings.sent4: His lustiest efforts in the gym paid off as he became the strongest in his class.
meanings.sent5: The lustiest tree in the forest stood tall and proud, its branches reaching out vigorously.

meanings.definition: Characterized by intense desire or craving
meanings.sent1: The child's lustiest wish was to have a puppy of his own.
meanings.sent2: She had the lustiest craving for chocolate, always sneaking pieces from the pantry.
meanings.sent3: His lustiest desire for adventure led him to explore the hidden caves in the mountains.
meanings.sent4: The lustiest hunger for knowledge drove her to read every book in the library.
meanings.sent5: The lustiest yearning for freedom made him dream of traveling the world.

meanings.sent1: The lustiest character in the play was always making inappropriate jokes.
meanings.sent2: She gave him the lustiest look, her eyes filled with desire.
meanings.sent3: The lustiest cat in the neighborhood was known for its amorous escapades.
meanings.sent4: His lustiest thoughts were always focused on the most scandalous ideas.
meanings.sent5: The lustiest scene in the movie left the audience blushing with its explicit content.
